name: CloudFrontDistributionConfigRestrictionsGeoRestriction
description: GeoRestriction is a property of the CloudFront DistributionConfiguration Restrictions property that describes the countries in which Amazon CloudFront allows viewers to access your content.

properties.name: Locations
properties.description: The two-letter, uppercase country code for a country that you want to include in your blacklist or whitelist.

properties.name: RestrictionType
properties.description: The method to restrict distribution of your content:
